reviewText: This video is so nostalgic for me. I used to watch it all the time when I was little and still remember every minute. Finding this was not easy, and I really just wanted to watch The Christmas Gift of Light, which apparently no one else had ever heard of. Buttons and Rusty is great, and the movie about the Trolls that want to destroy Christmas was never my favorite (it's fine, just not for me!), but the Christmas Gift of Light makes this worth it.
I bought this for our trip home for Christmas and its not as lo g as the site said it was. Mh daughter would t watch.
One of my favorite old cartoons. I only wish it was in DVD format. However, I am happy to get in any format.
